topic.title: How to Reference a Video Using a Key

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: Videos can also be referenced in DITA topics by using a key.
The key must be defined in the DITA map like this:<keydef keys="video" href="path/to/video.mp4" format="mp4"/>
The key is referenced in the topic with the datakeyref attribute within the object element:<object datakeyref="video" outputclass="video" width="480" height="270"/>
